text:
When compiling httpd2.0.48 + openssl-0.9.7c on Windows (using Cygwin), there 
is an error in Makefile.win(633):

copy docs\conf\ssl-std.conf "$(INSTDIR)\conf\ssl.default.conf" <.y

 That error made compiling failed.

 I believe that in this version (2.0.48), the ssl-std.conf file will be 
generated automatically from "docs\conf\ssl-std.conf.in". But I don't know why 
it was not generated.
creator: thaiha@psv.com.vn

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 24329 ***
